channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: A spilled milkshake causes a sticky situation in 'Dust Bunnies!', then in 'Mrs. Fuzzleglove!', a surprise visit from his mother forces Fuzzleglove to stoop to a new low - being a good guy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: We find out who can scare Storm in 'Scary Stories', then in 'The Smurf Who Lost His Shadow', Hefty's shadow wants to be free, but once they're separated, they're both in danger.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A sudden avalanche hits in 'Pups Get Your Goat', then in 'Pups Save the Crop Circles', Farmer Al finds mysterious crop circles in his corn field, and calls on the Paw Patrol to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Zuma and Hurricane get swept off the beach in 'Pups Save the Mountain Surfers', then in 'Pups Save Humdinger's Home Away From Home', Mayor Humdinger takes his kitties for a holiday.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny's magic licence is out of date and in order to get a new one she must pass a test, set by the Wise Old Elf.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: After the disappearance of Mrs Fotheringill, Mrs Elf becomes the twins' new teacher.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps the Troll untwist his tongue in 'Tongue Twisted Troll', then in 'Chompy and the Cloud Flower', Chompy chomped a rare seed and Dora finds a new one.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig has created a watering system, but he does not remember which button is which so Peppa and George help using walkie talkies. The Police hear their signal and are surprised.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig are working in their home office and Peppa wants to 'work' like them too. Peppa decides that she needs her own office, so she takes the cupboard under the stairs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family take a poorly swift to the vet's. After a night of rest, the swift recovers and Doctor Hamster releases it so it can fly around the world again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family are visiting Cousin Chloe's House to play with Baby Alexander. Peppa learns babies are not like dolls at all, and do lots of things every day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa hands Penny and Pedro the wrong glasses by mistake and they can't see very well. Madame Gazelle then tells them the importance of lenses and how they're in all sorts of things.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's a snowy day and Peppa's family build an igloo for their snowman. They then hide away in it during the snowstorm, but Penny Polar Bear and her parents love snowstorms and Peppa's igloo too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup when everyone finds out that Mr Bull and Mrs Cow are going to get married the next day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Everyone is getting ready for Mr Bull and Mrs Cow's wedding, going to the jewellers to get rings, to the dress makers. and to sort out the wedding cake.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: When Space Commander Megan is marooned on Pluto, our heroes race through wormholes, shoot past ice volcanoes, and blast through an asteroid field to bring them back.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The Stinkwells send Sam and Kit a strange case in 'The Frozen Stowaways', then in 'The Puzzle of the Empty Pond', a salamander mom wonders why her dry pond hasn't filled up with water.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: Stumpy refuses to wash his lucky cape in 'The Stank Monster!', then in 'Space Tacos!', when a taco truck glow-up attracts some out-of-this-world customers, the bunnies must save the day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy & Tia find a lost toy and vow to return it to its owner.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Kai is super excited to ride the Nebulator, but Tim isn't so sure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim and Kai try to photograph the illusive SpaceBug.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger is ready for a special day in 'Pups Save Helga and the Humsquatch', then in 'Pups Save the Missing Bone-Stone', the Museum has a brand-new exhibit - which goes missing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Travelling Travis finds a mysterious creature in troublein 'Pups Save a Humsquatch', and in 'Pups Save a Far Flung Flying Disc', a robo-toy causes mayhem, but Ryder knows just who to call.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Benny embrace his singing skills in 'Singin' in the Tub', then in 'Show and Share', Dora helps Boots find something for Show and Share.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: A tiny top hat delivery leads to a dazzling day for new magician Baby Box. Meanwhile, her closest friends help her perform a boppin'-and-hoppin' trick.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa is on a play date with Candy Cat at Mr Cat's Cafe. Candy show Mr Cat the drawings they've done of everyone, and he hangs them up for everyone to see.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa is playing with Freddy Fox at his home, in an apartment above the shops. Peggi and Pandora Panda, and Candy Cat live there too, and help show Peppa around.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and friends are at Penny Polar Bear's house for a movie night. But before they can watch it, the children need to decide where to sit, and which popcorn to eat.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy, Daddy, Peppa and George are going to the seaside. Mummy and Daddy explain clouds to Peppa and George who have a little sing and dance about clouds.

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: For an entire day the Kingdom has to make do without help from magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Nanny Plum and the Wise Old Elf compete to build a boat that will beat the Marigolds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Unable to pay the elves, King Thistle has to go to work to earn a coin.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Naughty Gaston is sent to pet school, where Miss Jolly soon gets him into shape.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Gustavo Goodway's guitar is missing in 'Pups Save Gustavo's Guitar', then in 'Pups Save the Yoga Goats', Farmer Yumi's new Yoga Goat class is a hit, until her goats go missing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: When Peppa decides to walk up the big hill during their family hike in the countryside, Daddy Pig assures her that the hard climb will be worth it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: On a cold day, Daddy Pig suggests they build a den until Mummy Pig has finished work. After a hard day's work, the cushion den is a perfect place to watch TV together.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and family are watching TV. until it breaks! While Grampy Rabbit fixes it, the family get a new TV which can do everything. but it doesn't beat their old TV.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig show Peppa and George how to play Flying Discs in the park. Soon their friends appear with their parents.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George are playing in their pool. They help the garden animals cool down but when it rains, the animals are happy and so is Peppa. Rain makes muddy puddles for jumping in.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.desc: First, Peppa and her friends visit the Little Cars play centre, where Miss Rabbit is in charge.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle reads Ben and Holly a book about a nasty witch, so Nanny takes the children to meet a real one who lives in the forest. Nanny is rude to the witch, who freezes her with magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Snooty King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit, but when the King's new clothes get dirty Nanny cleans them, along with the King's old clothes - and shrinks them all.

channel.desc: Holly and Nanny Plum join Ben at Elf School, where the Wise Old Elf tells them that strictly no magic should be used. Holly finds it difficult until Nanny uses a little magic to help.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle takes the whole class to London for the day and get a tour by The Queen herself.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle and the playgroup are sharing their best nursery rhymes with each other.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks the mystery hero doing good deeds in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington and the Unlikely Hero', then in 'Paddington Needs a Hero', Paddington gets stuck in an igloo.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: There's a special photo wall in the park in 'Paddington's Favourite Hero', then in 'Paddington And The Skateboarder', Mateo helps Paddington to become a heroic skateboarder.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A special spooky play is planned in 'Paddington and the Cursed Halloween Show', then in 'Paddington saves the Mooncake Festival', Taylor the lifeguard arrives in Windsor Gardens.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Taylor reveals its his birthday, but how can his friends make it special when they had no idea? It's Burn's Night and Mrs Bird teaches Paddington about a rare creature called a Wild Haggis.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger pretends to break his toe in order to win a race, so the pups build him a mobility device.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: When Corny runs away from Farmer Al's Farm during a blackout, the pups need to light the way to get them home safely.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington learns that seagulls love chips in 'Paddington vs the Seagulls', and in 'Paddington and the Light House', the lighthouse light is broken - can Paddington help save a boat at sea.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks Captain Green Beard's loot in 'Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt', then in 'Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper', everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A sudden avalanche hits in 'Pups Get Your Goat', then in 'Pups Save the Crop Circles', Farmer Al finds mysterious crop circles in his corn field, and calls on the Paw Patrol to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Mr. Crocodile
channel.desc: Daisy and Mr. Crocodile search for a lucky item to help them win a bike raffle in 'Lucky Croc', then in 'Sleepover Croc', Mr. Crocodile can't fall asleep at his first sleepover.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps a Unicornasaurus get a magic paintbrush back in 'Unicornasaurus', then in 'The Grumple Games', Dora helps Hearty win the Grumple Games.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Around the World With Dora
channel.desc: Help World Explorer Taiva and Dora make a Turkish good luck charm and find the tent rocks on your way to a hot air balloon festival in colourful Cappadocia.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa is building something in his shed. It is his latest pet project. It's a robot called Frank.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup. Madame Gazelle is teaching the children fun games to play with paper.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy, Daddy, Peppa and George are going to the seaside. Mummy and Daddy explain clouds to Peppa and George who have a little sing and dance about clouds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: When the Bubblemaker starts trapping everything in his trouble bubbles, Blaze and Sparkle have to become superheroes to save Axle City.

channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim tries to bend all the rules when Terri comes to babysit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy, Tia and Grandma go on the search for treasure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: It's the Roar festival, and Tim wants to have the best Roar in town.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Gabby unboxes an attachment that turns Carlita into an Ice Cream Truck! The only problem is.there's no ice cream.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Francois directs a video about Mr. Porter's new line of pies in 'Pups Save the Director', then in 'Pups Save the Super Cows', Mooo-na Lisa and Bettina run away disguised as superheroes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Harold creates a ray that freezes everything in 'Mighty Pups vs. The Big Chill', then in 'Mighty Pups vs. The Mighty Cheetah', Chase must stop Cheetah and restore his crystal.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and friends are at Penny Polar Bear's house for a movie night. But before they can watch it, the children need to decide where to sit, and which popcorn to eat.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Sheep and Suzy take Granny Pig and Peppa around Art House Day. After a day full of screen printing and silhouette miniatures, Granny Pig finds the perfect artwork.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle and Mr Bull lead the children to the wildflower wood to learn all about flowers. The children enjoy identifying Wild Garlic, Bluebells and even an orchid.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George are playing at their grandparent's garden on a very hot day but they don't have a paddling pool.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Elephant invites Peppa and Daddy Pig to perform magic at Emily's birthday party, and Peppa shows her friends how the magic trick works.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Daddy Pig receives a jumping stick and tries to show how to use it, but finds it difficult. Peppa and her friends struggle too. But there's always jumping in muddy puddles.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Miss Rabbit gives Peppa and friends a tennis lesson, but the tennis balls get everywhere! So, the children play badminton instead and it's a lot easier.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family are on a caravan adventure and the first stop is The Biggest Potato in the World. When it starts to get foggy, they park up before another busy day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Wise Old Elf fears an alien invasion after a presumed shooting star lands in the Little Kingdom.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle does not want to get any older so decides that no one must celebrate his birthday. But all of the Little Kingdom has been waiting to celebrate.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Despite protests from the Wise Old Elf, Ben accompanies Holly to her first day at magic school.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Snobby King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit the Little Kingdom, and Holly and her Mummy and Daddy enlist the Elf Band to impress them.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Squirrels stash acorns in Alex's treehouse in 'Pups Save the Squirrels', then in 'Pups Save a Roo', when a joey is separated from its mother, it's up to the pups to save a roo and the day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Darington can't wait to ride the tallest, fastest carnival ride in all of Axle City! But when Darington's tickets blow away, he and Blaze must try to retrieve them.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Doctor Hamster comes to school to talk about butterflies.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny and her friends historical re-enactment society are being cave people. Peppa and George join in helping to catch Grandpa Pig who is dressed as a mammoth.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle teaches the playgroup to play the recorder. After lots of practice at home, they put on a concert for their parents.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: On a cold day, Daddy Pig suggests they build a den until Mummy Pig has finished work. After a hard day's work, the cushion den is a perfect place to watch TV together.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Auntie, Uncle Pig and cousin Chloe are coming for dinner and Peppa is allowed to join too! Peppa is very proud of staying up late - she even stayed up later than the Daddies.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and family are watching TV. until it breaks! While Grampy Rabbit fixes it, the family get a new TV which can do everything. but it doesn't beat their old TV.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Pig is baking an apple pie, so Daddy Pig suggests Peppa and George play a game of looking for things.

channel.title: Around the World With Dora
channel.desc: Help World Explorer Rayne and Dora get ready for a magical Japanese flower celebration by finding a lucky fish and preparing traditional Japanese sushi.

channel.desc: Mr. Crocodile wants to be a good guest in 'Birthday Party', then in 'Tick Tock Mr. Croc', Mr. Crocodile and Daisy misplace their concert tickets while rushing to get there on time.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: It's autumn and the Elves and Nanny Plum are busy clearing up all the leaves. Suddenly the squirrels arrive with a mission to store acorns in the Great Elf Tree. Acorn Day has arrived.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Ben and Holly set out to rescue Redbeard the Elf Pirate's sunken treasure. Mr Elf steers the Elf Submarine to the bottom of the lake, but then they are gobbled up by Big Bad Barry.

channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to school on their scooters. He decides it would be quicker to ride back and he discovers riding scooters is such fun. He shows Mummy Pig how fun it is too.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: On a day out with her family, Peppa is encouraged to find words to describe the different kinds of puddles they find.

channel.desc: Mandy Mouse joins Peppa's playgroup. She uses a wheelchair and is super sporty. The children have a lot of fun playing together.

channel.desc: A new synthesiser arrives for Daddy Pig, and his family collect sounds for it from around the house while he is out at work.

channel.desc: During a picnic in her garden, cousin Chloe shows Peppa and George fun things to do with wild flowers.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly forgets Ben's birthday, and rushes home to make him a birthday card. But Nanny has stopped all magic, so Holly has to make the card herself.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle reads the children a story, which inspires a question. They can't find the answer in the magic books in the castle, so go instead to the Wise Old Elf in the Great Elf Library.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben and Holly meet a new friend, Betty Caterpillar, but she is sad that she can't join in their games because she can't fly.
